summary: When his father dies, a young man is introduced by his attractive, amoral mother to a world of hedonism and depravity.
cast: Isabelle Huppert|Louis Garrel|Emma de Caunes|Joana Preiss|Jean-Baptiste Montagut|Dominique Reymond|Olivier Rabourdin|Philippe Duclos|Pascal Tokatlian|Theo Hakola|Nuno Lopes|Patrick Fanik|Susi Egetenmeier|Sylvia Love Johnson
title: Mi madre
